sen.e: According to a record on posterity, 'Sonyumonjo' in 1688, he got married to the granddaughter of Sokei TANAKA, and later set up a studio for creating ceramics with Sokei, his eldest son, Tanaka Syozaemonsomi, and his second son, Kichizaemon Rakujokei who became the second head of Raku Kichizaemon family later.
